api ehema thamayi hariya...api wage ayath jiwath wenna epayi halape..mathakada andare gala ussan gihin thibba hati rajjuruwanta penna..ussala karen thibboth genihin thiyannan kiwe..ee wage thama halape..lasan mahaththayatawath matawath thaniyen karanna puluwan deyak neweyi oya karala thiyenne..sayit eke warkarslama 12,000k withara hitiya...anika ooka ran karanna dawasakata staf eka 8000k oona...ithin thawa monada katha...mayi lasan mahaththayayi salli tikak hoyagaththa...lankawata wadagath echcharayine...ape aakiyo mata kiyanne petro dolar aakitekt kiyala..maru ne...api dan gowithanak karana bath tikak kala nidagannawa ithin....kamak na neda...?

wiganana komishan sabhawe karya saha karthawya pahadiliwama aandukrama wyawasthawe dakwa athayida ema komishan sabhawa pathkara aththe wiganakadhipathi departhamenthuwe mulya ha paripalana swadhinathawa wenuwen yayida pihituwimata apekshitha rajya sewa wiganana sewawe niladharinge pathkirim, maru kirim, usas kirim saha winaya katayuthu wiganana komisamata ema panathin pawarenne yayida jathika wiganana aayathanaye aya - waya sambandha pariksha kara kathanayakawarayata idiripath kirime karyabharayak wiganana komishan sabhawata pawarenne yayida kiya.

wathman rajaye aarthika sanwardhana wadapiliwela yatathe ihala aarthika wardhana wegayak langa karaganima sandaha paudgalika anshayen wadi dayakathwayak labaganimin ihala sewa niyukthiyak athi karaganima ilakka kara ganimin, adala siyalu parshwayange adahas salakillata gena yawathkalina karanu laba athi 'jathika manawa sampath ha sewa niyukthi prathipaththiya' kriyathmaka kirima pinisa kamkaru ha wruththiya samithi sabandatha amathya dabliw.di.je.senewirathna mahatha idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

kalin thibuna rejimaye siti rajapaksha gathi kotas wisin kara gena yana lada darunu pracharath wipakshayata awasidayaka wana paridi jathika aarakshawa, eekiya rajyaya, rate swairibhawaya ha bhaumika akhandathawaya sambandhayen wipakshaye nyaya pathraya matha patawana lada noyek awahirakam madhyaye pawa mema mathiwaranayata sahabhagi wima pilibadawa demala janathawata prashansa kala yuthu bawa mage mathayayi. 1940 gananwalin pasu lankawe pawathwana lada mathiwaranawalin wargaya ha aagama yana karunu mathiwarana prathipalaya wetha balapana aakaraye pradhana bhumikawak ranga nodakwana lada palamu mathiwaranaya meya bawa mage nigamanaya yi.

netbol kridawe diyunuwa wenuwen mahajana bankuwa rupiyal laksha 230ka anugrahayak dakwayi.krida amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahathage illimak anuwa mahajana bankuwe ‘wanitha wasana‘ sannam namaya yatathe me anugrahaya himiwa atha.wasara gananawak netbol kridawata sthira anugrahakayeku nositi athara mahajana bankuwa netbol krida ithihasaye wishalama anugrahayata dayakawimada wisheshathwayaki.labana agosthu masaye shri lankawe pawathwena aasiyanu netbol shurathawaliya ilakka karagena shri lanka netbol athuru kamituwa gena yana wada piliwelata shakthiyak labadima ha ratapura netbol krida wyaptha kirima me anugrahaya yatathe siduwanu atha.krida amathiwarayage illima anuwa pradhana krida 10kata melesa anugrahakayan idiripathwi athi athara emagin idiri kalaye kridawe wishala pariwarthanayak balaporeththu we.netbol kridawa wenuwen mahajana bankuwa dakwu anugrahaya labana wasara dakwa kriyathmaka we.netbol athuru kamituwata sambandha disthrik netbol sangam haraha daksha netbol kridikawan soya ganima thulin idiriyedi jathika sanchithayak nirmanaya kirimata apeksha karayi.emenma netbola winisuruwan,upadeshakayan athulu niladharin puhunu kirime wadasatahanda kriyathmaka kere.

kesewuwath ada (09) dinaye me sambandhawa wisheha sakachchawak buddhashasana katayuthu amathyawarayage pradhanathwayen pawathwena bawath jagath sumathipala athulu wathman paripalanaya wisin samastha lanka bauddha maha sammelanaya ta sidukara athi haniya amathyawarayage awadhanayata yomukarana bawada ema wirodhathawata sudanamwa sitina parshawaya sandahan karayi.

kriyanwithaya[sanskaranaya] yali-arambaunu thrasthawadi pragamanaya[sanskaranaya] juni 15 dinaye agabhagayedi, punaragatha paharadim walin pasuwa, nakshabandi hamudawa saha hitapu bathwarun wisin prathamika lesin meheyawunu thrasthawadi praharayak thulin, ta la far saha ehi asabada wu guwan kandawura alla gathha[19] sthanaya aarakshakala pirisa, behewin shiya tarkamiyanwaru saha mosal wethin pasubasimin siti soldaduwan wethin samanwitha wu athara, owuhu kurdi-palanaya yatathathi bhumi bhagaya wethata pana gathha.[20] [21]ta la far sandaha satanehidi, satankamin 18 deneku miya giya athara thrasthawadin wisin nagarayata shel prahara ella kirima nisa janaya dasadenek miya giyaha. [22]
